name: Art of Time
description:
Vincent has always been crazy about art, hasn't he? Vincent needs art, a lot of art.

Rewind

Control the timings of enemies to sneak, use REWIND.

Map

Use the map to find paintings.

Enemies

Don't get caught by the enemies, they shoot without warning.

Paintings

Collect the entire collection of paintings. Find out more about the masterpieces of the Renaissance.

Credits

Daria Bidna - Game Design

Artem Krivoshey - Code

Anna Petrykina - Art
